hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to tezacaftor. Manufacturer advises adjust dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors, see tezacaftor with ivacaftor and tezacaftor with ivacaftor and elexacaftor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tezacaftor .  Manufacturer advises adjust dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors, see  tezacaftor with ivacaftor  and  tezacaftor with ivacaftor and elexacaftor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to markedly increase the exposure to ticagrelor. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   markedly   increase   the exposure to   ticagrelor .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole might increase the exposure to tigecycline. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   might   increase   the exposure to   tigecycline .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Tipranavir is predicted to increase the exposure to ketoconazole. Manufacturer advises use with caution and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tipranavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   ketoconazole .  Manufacturer advises use with caution and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to tofacitinib. Manufacturer advises adjust tofacitinib dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tofacitinib .  Manufacturer advises adjust  tofacitinib  dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to tolterodine. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tolterodine .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to tolvaptan. Manufacturer advises caution or adjust tolvaptan dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tolvaptan .  Manufacturer advises caution or adjust  tolvaptan  dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to topotecan. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   topotecan .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to toremifene. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   toremifene .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to trabectedin. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ketoconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   trabectedin .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the concentration of trametinib. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasDitaContent.@value: Ketoconazole is predicted to increase the risk of tretinoin toxicity when given with tretinoin. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.
